ai_workspace_intro.message: AI Werkruimte is een krachtige functie die is ontworpen om het potentieel van AI-modellen te maximaliseren, waardoor u analyses kunt maken en hele notitiecollecties tegelijk kunt verwerken in plaats van individuele notities.

ai_workspace_no_notes.message: Geen notities in deze collectie om te analyseren

ai_workspace_processing.description: Text shown while AI is processing in workspace

ai_workspace_prompt.message:
What would you like AI to do with these notes?

Examples:
- Summarize all notes
- Extract main themes and keywords
- Create a master to-do list
- Generate FAQ from these notes
- Find connections between topics
ai_workspace_prompt.description: Prompt text for AI Workspace task input

ai_workspace_responseFailedRetry.message: AI response failed. Please try again.
ai_workspace_responseFailedRetry.description: Error message when AI response fails

ai_workspace_task_faq.message: From these notes, create a list of frequently asked questions and answers (FAQ). Identify important topics and create appropriate questions with detailed answers.

ai_workspace_task_label.description: Label for task in AI workspace analysis

ai_workspace_task_search.message: Find and explain connections between information in the notes. Identify links, contradictions, or relationships between different topics mentioned in the notes.

ai_workspace_task_synthesis.message: Create a comprehensive summary from all notes in this collection. Highlight the most important points and create a single, cohesive summary.

ai_workspace_task_themes.message: Identify 5 main themes and related keywords from these research notes. Create a structured list with themes and corresponding keywords.

ai_workspace_task_todo.message: Scan all notes and create a comprehensive to-do list. Find all 'action items', tasks, or work to be done mentioned in the notes and create a structured checklist.

ai_workspace_usage_limit.message: Dagelijkse gebruikslimiet bereikt. Upgrade naar premium voor onbeperkte toegang tot AI Werkruimte.
ai_workspace_usage_limit.description: Message when daily limit is reached
